title: Can some one give me some advice for Master yi?
body:
Hi guys i started playing Yi but i dont know any good builds or at all what items could be good on him. I used to play Support. Can some one tell me some good items on him and some situtational based items?
Id also appreciate it if someone could tell me a master yi main. His name (who is also maining him now).

replies.body:
As far as I can remember, I had never used Master Yi as a Top laner in pvp, I did use him as a Jungler in pvp, if I remember correctly.
Statikk Shiv would be a good item for him, good when fighting against minions.

or go the jungle tank route, which I feel is far more reliable right now:
{{champion:11}} {{item:1419}} {{item:3153}}{{item:3742}}  {{item:3065}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3111}} 
or the lethality build which is really fun:
{{champion:11}} {{item:1412}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3814}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3047}} 

If you want to copy the builds of the best korean high elo yi players from op.gg:

{{item:1419}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3071}} these seem to be core

 {{item:3742}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3156}}  these are popular items and generally they'll pick 2 of these depending on what sort of damage they need to itemise against.

{{item:3047}} and {{item:3111}}  tend to be the best boots it seems

Skillmax appears to be standard with q>e>w , masteries are 18-12 taking freshblood, bounty hunter and fervor keystone in ferocity and runic affinity, merciless and dangerous game in cunning. Runes are usually 9flat ad marks, 9flat armour seals, 9 scaling mr glyphs and 3atkspeed quints.


Then again high elo korea is a very different place to other elos in other regions so do what tends to feel or work well for you on a pergame basis is generally best.
